titleStmt.title: A decree lately made in the High Court of Starre-Chamber after consultation had among the iudges, and certificate of their opinions in diuers things, &c. And also a confirmation of that decree by His Sacred Maiestie; together with His Maiesties command that the same be printed, published, and put in due execution.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Star Chamber.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

titleStmt.title: A decree lately made in the High Court of Starre-Chamber after consultation had among the iudges, and certificate of their opinions in diuers things, &c. And also a confirmation of that decree by His Sacred Maiestie; together with His Maiesties command that the same be printed, published, and put in due execution.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Star Chamber.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: The Star Chamber decree was made 13 Nov. 1633; the King's command 14 Dec. 1633.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which shows signatures: A-D‚Å¥.
Running title reads: A decree of Starre-Chamber.
Quires A-C each come in two states showing partial resetting.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
